title: Kotak Mahindra Bank | DE3 | Bengaluru
content:

Company: Kotak Mahindra Bank
Title/Level: DE3
Location: Begaluru
Salary: 49 LPA Fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: Relocation expenses are covered(including flight ticket to family, 2 weeks accomodation, etc)
Stock bonus: None

Other details: compensation included medical insurance and gratuity(As HR mentioned gratuity would be provided when leaving the company irrespective of the duration served)
